channel.title: **For Prospective Applicants** on Princeton COS Undergraduate Course Assistants Program
channel.description: Recent content in **For Prospective Applicants** on Princeton COS Undergraduate Course Assistants Program

item.title: How/When to Apply
item.description: This is a page to explain how/when to apply.

item.title: Before Getting Paid...
item.description: This is a page to provide indications of everything that needs to be done before getting paid. To be rewritten # From registration page: IMPORTANT PAYROLL INFORMATION Students who are NOT ALREADY on payroll will need to fill out the necessary forms at the Student Employment Office. [Their website](https://puwebp.princeton.edu/StudentEmployment/index.jsf) explains what you need to bring to their office to register. Read it BEFORE you come to campus. Hiring requires being on the university payroll.
